Only weird thing that I see is that you have to click twice on the menus to make them drop down and sometimes a menu name stays highlighted so the shortcut keys don't work. You just have to hit escape twice or the Alt key till the menu is not highlighted

Powerfull mate! it's really working, Thanks! ;)

For those who have problems don't forget to right mouse click and select run as administrator.
